word: Elder Daniells is a man who has proved the testimonies to be true. And he has proved true to the testimonies. When he has found that he has differed with them, he has been willing to acknowledge his error, and come to the light. . . . The Lord has given Elder Daniells reproof when he has erred, and he has shown his determination to stand on the side of truth and righteousness, and to correct his mistakes.--Letter 255, 1904, p. 3. (To Brethren Magan and Sutherland, July 23, 1904.) Released October 1965.
